section.para: To apply a Credit Memo amount to an A/P open item, select the APPLY button. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Apply Credit Memo Amount to A/P Open Item

section.para: When applying a Credit Memo amount to an A/P open item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the Vendor number of the Vendor whose A/P open item the amount is being applied to. The Vendor name will also display.
Displays the Document Number associated with the A/P open item.
Displays the Document Type of the Document.
Displays the date the Document is due.
Displays the original amount due for the selected Document.
Displays the amount paid to date toward the original Document amount.
Displays the amount of the referring Credit Memo available to be applied.
Specify the amount to apply to the A/P open item.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without applying an amount to the Item, returning you to the application desktop.
Applies the amount to the Item.
